WorkItem.ClosedComment: Eclipse plugins are already being worked on by third parties and is generally outside of the scope of the bug tracker, which focuses more on the TypeScript compiler and the Visual Studio plugin.
WorkItem.Description: Please add Eclipse support. So that TypeScript files would work in Eclipse IDE.

Comments.Message:
There is already an IDEA plugin, but the point is that it seems this will be very popular for Eclipse as well 
http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-2069
You can try [TypEcs](http://typecsdev.com/) it provides some additional features like OpenType dialog and Add TypeScript definition from catalog.
